tab2.text1:
Enable Wild Dino Pickup: Yes
Enable Cave Flyers: Yes

Experience Point Multiplier: 5.0
TamingSpeedMultiplier: 10
Resource Harvest Amount Multiplier: 5
Egg Hatching Speed Multiplier: 20.0
Baby Maturation Speed (Multiplier): 35.0
Baby Cuddle Interval (Multiplier): 0.1
Mating Interval Multiplier: 0.1
Mating Speed Multiplier: 5.0
Max Dino Level: 150
Max Structures in range: 10000
Player Water Requirement (Multiplier): 0.5
Player Food Requirement (Multiplier): 0.5
Player Stamina Requirement (Multiplier): 0.75
Player Health Regeneration (Multiplier): 1.5
Dino Health Regeneration (Multiplier): 2.0
Resource Respawn Period (Multiplier): 0.75
tab2.text2:
<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">Omega Dino Storage</>
This mod gives you access to cloud-based dino storage!
Craft the Omega Storage Controller and equip it. Right click will show you the options.

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">Automated Ark</>
Automated Ark is made to take some of the more mundane tasks in Ark and make them enjoyable so you can jump straight into the fun stuff.

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">Dino+ (Nanny, Hatchey)</>
D+ Nanny and D+ Hatchery, takes the hassle out of hatching and raising baby dinosaurs. Automates imprinting and feeding processes.

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">Shiny! Dinos Ascended</>
Are you bored with the constant dreary colors of Ark Dinos? Make your life more Shiny! That feeling when you walk over the Ark, and you see a pretty Dino you absolutely must have? That's Shiny!.

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">ASA Teleporters</>
Teleporters for everyone, place down a teleporter and make it private or public to everyone!

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">Der Dino Finder</>
This mod adds two buttons to the inventory map: One to open the Dino Finder and one to remove all waypoints.
In the Dino Finder, the dinosaurs can be filtered by species, gender and level. When using the search function, waypoints are created for the 10 closest dinosaurs.
